de.mpa.io.parser.mascot.xml

Class MascotModification

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mpa.io.parser.mascot.xml.MascotModification

  • public class MascotModification
extends Object
    Class representing a post-translational amino acid modification
    Author:
    A. Behne

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MascotModification(Node modNode, boolean fixed)
      Creates a modification from the provided Mascot XML node.
      MascotModification(String name, char residue, float delta)
      Creates a variable modification from the provided name string, residue character and mass delta.
      MascotModification(String name, char residue, float delta, boolean fixed)
      Creates a modification from the provided name string, residue character, mass delta and flag denoting fixed/variable status.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MascotModification

        public MascotModification(String name,
                          char residue,
                          float delta)
        Creates a variable modification from the provided name string, residue character and mass delta.
        Parameters:
        name - the modification name
        residue - the amino acid residue 1-letter code
        delta - the nominal mass delta

      • MascotModification

        public MascotModification(String name,
                          char residue,
                          float delta,
                          boolean fixed)
        Creates a modification from the provided name string, residue character, mass delta and flag denoting fixed/variable status.
        Parameters:
        name - the modification name
        residue - the amino acid residue 1-letter code
        delta - the nominal mass delta
        fixed - true if this modification is fixed, false if this is a variable modification

      • MascotModification

        public MascotModification(Node modNode,
                          boolean fixed)
        Creates a modification from the provided Mascot XML node.
        Parameters:
        modNode - the Mascot XML node containing modification information
